body.p: The boards also received requests from some stakeholders for practical expedients in respect of the following:

li.p: accounting for contract modifications that occurred before transition to IFRS 15;
for entities electing to use the full retrospective transition method, accounting for a contract completed under previous revenue Standards before transition to IFRS 15; and
assessing whether a sales tax (or a similar tax) is collected on behalf of a third party.
